org.cloudgraph.mapreduce

Class GraphWritable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudgraph.mapreduce.GraphWritable

  • public class GraphWritable
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows data graphs to be consumable by Hadoop using XML serialization under standard SDO provided mechanisms. A data graph of any depth or complexity may be represented including graphs where the underlying model contains instances of multiple inheritance. No XML Schema is required as the serialized form is used as an internal representation only, and no XML Schema validation is performed.

    For the write operation, the root URI, prepended by an integer representing its length, is written out first as this is critical for de-serialization in some cases. Then the XML representation is written, also prepended by an integer representing its length. During the read operation, the root URI is first un-marshaled and then used as an option for XML de-serialization.

    Since:
    0.5.8
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
    See Also:
    commonj.sdo.DataGraph, commonj.sdo.helper.XMLDocument
